meanings.definition: A person who blazes a trail for others to follow.
meanings.sent1: The trailblazers in our community organized a clean-up day for the park.
meanings.sent2: The team of trailblazers led the way through the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The trailblazers decided to have a race to see who could clean up the trail the fastest.
meanings.sent4: She was a trailblazer in the field of science, paving the way for future discoveries.
meanings.sent5: The trailblazers left a lasting impact on the community with their volunteer work.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are the first to do something or go somewhere.
meanings.sent1: Our school's trailblazers were the first to reach the mountain's summit.
meanings.sent2: The trailblazers explored uncharted territories in search of new resources.
meanings.sent3: The trailblazers decided to have a picnic at the top of the mountain to celebrate their journey.
meanings.sent4: The team of trailblazers forged ahead, undeterred by the challenges they faced.
meanings.sent5: The trailblazers set out on their expedition with courage and determination.
